body_html:
I think I may have found the problem with the failed wheel build.

In the CMake command I replaced
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=python.exe
with
-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:/ProgramData/Anaconda3/python.exe

The problem appears to be that despite python.exe being in the PATH, CMake will prepend a local pathname to python.exe if it doesn't have an absolute pathname.

Testing now.

The "build always" problem still unresolved.

body:
I think I may have found the problem with the failed wheel build.

In the CMake command I replaced
```-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=python.exe```
with
```-DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE=C:/ProgramData/Anaconda3/python.exe```

The problem appears to be that despite python.exe being in the PATH, CMake will prepend a local pathname to python.exe if it doesn't have an absolute pathname.

Testing now.

The "build always" problem still unresolved.
